review_data.title: Ein Bijou

review_data.title: my favorite place to be
review_data.content: Tina is my favorite place to have drinks with friends. you can smoke a cigar inside and enjoy one of the great cocktails. The range of gins and tonics (several different ones) and other liquors is exeptional, as is the service!
